Name: Grass Cut
About the game: Grass Cut is a casual puzzle game where the main objective is to place the lawn mower in the correct place to cut all the grass. Click and drag the lawn mowers with the mouse to solve the puzzles by mowing the lawn. relaxing soundtrack; Levels with progressive difficulty; Pleasant color palette
